field.rule: (?i)(?:JET Database Engine|Access Database Engine|\[Microsoft\]\[ODBC Microsoft Access Driver\])
(?i)(?:DB2 SQL error:|\[IBM\]\[CLI Driver\]\[DB2/6000\]|CLI Driver.*DB2|DB2 SQL error|db2_\w+\()
(?i)(?:An illegal character has been found in the statement|com\.informix\.jdbc|Exception.*Informix)
(?i)(?:Warning: ibase_|Unexpected end of command in statement)

(?i)(?:System\.Data\.OleDb\.OleDbException|\[Microsoft\]\[ODBC SQL Server Driver\]|\[Macromedia\]\[SQLServer JDBC Driver\]|\[SqlException|System\.Data\.SqlClient\.SqlException|Unclosed quotation mark after the character string|'80040e14'|mssql_query\(\)|Microsoft OLE DB Provider for ODBC Drivers|Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server|Incorrect syntax near|Sintaxis incorrecta cerca de|Syntax error in string in query expression|Procedure or function .* expects parameter|Unclosed quotation mark before the character string|Syntax error .* in query expression|Data type mismatch in criteria expression\.|ADODB\.Field \(0x800A0BCD\)|the used select statements have different number of columns|OLE DB.*SQL Server|Warning.*mssql_.*|Driver.*SQL[\-\_\ ]*Server|SQL Server.*Driver|SQL Server.*[0-9a-fA-F]{8}|Exception.*\WSystem\.Data\.SqlClient\.)

(?i)(?:supplied argument is not a valid MySQL|Column count doesn't match value count at row|mysql_fetch_array\(\)|on MySQL result index|You have an error in your SQL syntax;|You have an error in your SQL syntax near|MySQL server version for the right syntax to use|\[MySQL\]\[ODBC|Column count doesn't match|Table '[^']+' doesn't exist|SQL syntax.*MySQL|Warning.*mysql_.*|valid MySQL result|MySqlClient\.)

(?i)(?:PostgreSQL query failed:|pg_query\(\) \[:|pg_exec\(\) \[:|PostgreSQL.*ERROR|Warning.*pg_.*|valid PostgreSQL result|Npgsql\.|PG::([a-zA-Z]*)Error|Supplied argument is not a valid PostgreSQL (?:.*?) resource|Unable to connect to PostgreSQL server)
